title: My Pixel4 XL did not response after turn on the phone and stocked at the Google's "G" logo.
content: it happened first time, after I found my phone might be update the software and stocked on the "G" logo and took me at least 10 minutes for waiting, I reboot the phone and found it still stocked on this screen.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
